thread.title: Trinny Woodall in awkward wardrobe malfunction as she unwittingly flashes a boob filming video blog
thread.title_full: Trinny Woodall in awkward wardrobe malfunction as she unwittingly flashes a boob filming video blog

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Trinny Woodall in awkward wardrobe malfunction as she unwittingly flashes a boob filming video blog
text:
Showbiz Trinny Woodall in awkward wardrobe malfunction as she unwittingly flashes a boob filming video blog The style expert was advising her followers how to wear gym wear to flatter their shape when she accidentally revealed a little too much Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Fashion guru Trinny Woodhall flashes boob by mistake during video blog Share this video Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Even Trinny Woodall isn't immune to the odd embarrassing fashion faux pas. 
The style guru, 53, regularly uploads tutorials to her Facebook page and YouTube channel. 
And one of her most recent clips got a lot more attention than usual - but probably not for the right reasons. 
Speaking from the comfort of her West London home, Trinny, who has over 20,000 followers on her YouTube channel, was advising fans how to wear gym gear to flatter their shape. 
But as she explained how she prefers to tuck her top into her trousers rather than leave it loose and swallow her hips, she lifted her grey top a little too high and cheekily flashed her right boob. Whoops! (Photo: Facebook/TrinnyWoodhall) The video is still on her account (Photo: Facebook/TrinnyWoodhall) 
Clearly unaware of the wardrobe malfunction, she then uploaded the clip to her Facebook account. 
The video, which is still available to watch on her Facebook page, has now been viewed around 120,000 times. 
Other videos shared on her page feature beauty tips, including how to chose the right concealer and lip colour to match your skin tone, and also the biggest trends for spring and summer. (Photo: Facebook/TrinnyWoodhall) 
Meanwhile, Trinny, who is a regular style expert on This Morning, recently had hosts Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield in hysterics after she made a sexual gag. 
As the former BBC star showed off transformations and gave tips on how to find the perfect jeans, she accidentally found herself propositioning Phillip. 
As the presenter complained about his own jeans, he revealed that he'd been forced to change out of his original look for being "too casual". Trinny regularly posts videos (Photo: Facebook/Trinny Woodall) 
Trinny responded: "Let me come in your changing room one day..." 
A stunned Holly and Phillip gasped before breaking out into a giggling fit. 
It didn't take Trinny long to catch on to what she had said, and soon enough she couldn't stop laughing while Phil and Holly tried to complete the segment. Like us on Facebook
